thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: CT
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by CT

author: CT
title: CT
text:
I really like your online store ,easy to navigate and purchase items. Great variety and choice of garments .As I live in Dublin their isn't a store near by to visit and shop in so its great to have access online .
I critical observation ,while purchasing sale items it is most disappointing to have to pay postage on returns.
Thank You
CT
